name: Rhythm Hack
description:
"""Musical""" roguelike made for \\U-feff Jam 2020

Can you descend the dungeon with your guitar and kill... THE BAD MAN?

----------------------------------------

Controls:

1 2 3 4 to play musical notes
WASD or arrows to move

Settings:
F1 Turn on/off beat bounce
F2 Turn on/off strobe lights
F3 Change song
F4 Turn on/off full screen
+  Scale game up
-  Scale game down
